website_summaries.verdict: Well worth their price point, thanks to each coffee variety’s intense, yet smooth, brew.
pros: Incredibly robust, dark coffee, without the “burnt” taste that many intense dark roasts often have
Brews up with a rich crema layer that intensifies the taste
cons: Doesn’t include the highest intensity flavors like Durkhan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tasting coffee capsule to use in Nespresso machines. We like this specific selection because it covers a wide spectrum of intensities within the category of "Intense". We prefer robust, dark coffee and this one pleases both my husband and myself, and any combination of our four children and their spouses who come by. The package itself arrived on time and in excellent undamaged condition. The price is competitive and costs less than ordering directly from Nespresso. We easily recycle the aluminum capsules. This is our number one place to shop for Nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A.

customer_reviews.title: other reviews incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Other Reviewers are incorrect. If you buy directly from Nespresso, these are .70 each, for 50=$35, plus the extra shipping for $6. So you get basically the same deal here as directly from Nespresso. With the added convenience of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: cooz

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso Lover
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this coffee. I have tried the compatible one for Nespresso and have decided that I am worth the bold rich creamy flavor of the true Nespresso capsules. Only coffee I can drink without milk. I feel like I exaggerate when I talk about this coffee, I just love it so much. I have been drinking this brand for a year and a half. Starbucks beans just taste burned to me, If you feel the same way you will love this coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee and have 2 cups every morning with a sprinkle of cardamom and stevia with breakfast. I keep re-ordering this, and I am on my third Nespresso machine. The intense expressos taste better to me than the flavored ones. Putting my own flavoring in works the best for me. The foam on the top of the coffee is just great. I will stay with these capsules for as long as possible. There is a recycling service I believe that you can request from Nespresso company if you are concerned about being green. Nice coffees. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kstars

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down Best Coffee Available in This Format
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso is hands-down the best coffee available in this format. I consider myself somewhat a coffee snob and having purchased a Nespresso machine and capsules, I am thoroughly impressed. Each capsule variety has its on unique (non-bitter) taste. The crema layer on top of each shot is rich, creamy and flavorful. I would recommend Nespresso and this variety pack without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Where's Godot?Top Contributor: Classic Rock

customer_reviews.title: Super fast.  Super delicious
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow they're fast! I love my Nespresso maker...:these pods are delicious. I mix one with my coffee every day. I used to go to Starbucks and would need a quad shot to get this affect. Winning! Nestle you are losing out on amazon. While I love your product, the customer service is better here.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled flavor!
customer_reviews.text: The Nespresso pods taste outstanding! I especially like the more intense blends but so far all are very good. Yes, they are pricey but in my opinion well worth it. I have tried several alternatives including loading my own reusable pods with fairly decent espresso blend coffee but nothing matches the excellent cup I get from the Nespresso machine. I only wish the Cafecito de Cuba was offered more frequently, Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: James W. Sherburne

customer_reviews.title: ALL capsules arrived dented but in perfect sleeves!
customer_reviews.text: All capsules are dented - sleeves are perfect but contents damaged? Perhaps these are seconds!??? Paid full price so I expect first quality. Refund requested! Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: BCG

customer_reviews.title: Mehhhhhhh. Not even close to the best.
customer_reviews.text: So I was nervous and disappointed about this purchase. I was worried about getting damaged pods. Which I did get one sleeve of damaged ones. The casing is so thin that even the slightest touch will crumple the nespresso pod. Horrible packaging. Secondly I love love love strong bold coffee. But this was just disgusting. The flavoring is awful. I did like the Roma and that’s pretty much it. They smell so bad when they’re being made. They also leave a horrible taste in your mouth. Im going back to the other knock off brand I loved. These are just nasty. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashmo

customer_reviews.title: Got to have my morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: Almost every morning I make a cafe mocha. How do I do it? One shot of expresso from my Nespresso Machine. I only use Nespresso capsules and generally intensity 9 to 12. I add milk, heat in microwave, add Ghiradelli Double Chocolate Premium Hot Cocoa (comes in a red 10.5 ouce package), stir and heat to taste. It's great and a lot cheaper than going to a fancy coffee shop
customer_reviews.author: Coopster

customer_reviews.title: Good flavored espresso
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much flawless. I've had espresso machines but they're too much of a pain to use every day. I now have the cheapest Nespresso and I buy these pods, and by my palette, the flavor of the quality is equivalent to having been made in a real espresso machine. You pay for it, at roughly 80 cents per pod (I put 2 or 3 in my daily lattes), but still cheaper than a coffee house for the same, if not better, quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: Roma capsules defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the nespresso earlier this month. I LOVE the India capsules and sometimes order those individually. However, the ROMA capsules are defective and won't puncture on the top. It only punctures from the back of the capsules. My daughter tried to puncture one of them to get it to work when retrying. All that did was send coffee grinds into her cup. I know it's not my nespresso machine because the India capsules work well. Is it possible to return/exchange just the Roma capsules? Update: every time I order the price increases. I’ll be ordering from the Nespresso website. Better price, better choices.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Half of the Pods were Broken
customer_reviews.text: I generally like Nespresso machines. Ordering this particular variety pack resulted in greater than half of the pods being damaged or not usable. Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Caomanach

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping to HI, but damaged pods
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived timely (Hawaii), but was a little bit damaged. Only one pod had actually opened, but the grounds from it made a mess in all the boxes. Several other pods were a little damaged, but I think they will likely still work fine in the machine. We like the flavors, and the taste of the coffee. Since the price is decent and the shipping is timely, I will purchase from Amazon again. However, if I receive another shipment with damaged pods such as these, I will definitely find a different source.
customer_reviews.author: Tnr

customer_reviews.title: UNABLE TO RETURN THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a product. It was not the right product. Expensive product. Unable to return! Nothing more than the facts. This was not an obvious piece of knowledge to know what I’m buying this product. If you were like I, who assumes Amazon will return just about everything except batteries, are wrong. I bought this product in the size is slightly off. I did not notice the description where product is deemed unreturnable. To be careful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee! Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought these about 3 times so far and have given the link to my family members as well to buy. They last me awhile and are so delicious. They come fast and the packaging is always great. Ive really only had one "dud" in the 3 times I bought this to where the pod wouldn't "break open" in the machine. Other than that I will most certainly keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Broderick

customer_reviews.title: First 2 of 3 pods jammed. Rest seem ok. Good quality coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to fine tune my coffee profiles to what is offered so I selected this combination. The first 2 pods jammed causing a failed coffee. The last 10 or so have operated fine. Coffee from my Meile great as expected. This is a good quality pod. Unlike others that I have been unfortunate enough to try. So overall it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jahoo

customer_reviews.title: Great espresso but shipping crushes pods
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Nespresso. No qualms with the flavor, but the packaging from Amazon stinks! Last month we lost a good part of a sleeve. I thought it was a fluke and didn’t bother complaining in time. Today another shipment arrived in a soft sided envelope and the outer casing is bent again. Not sure if it will look as bad when we open the sleeve as these pictured from last month, but annoyed that I didn’t complain in time to get those replaced if this is going to be an ongoing problem! They shouldn’t use soft sided envelopes. These are fragile!
customer_reviews.author: YaYa Mom

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! please use the free UPS envelope to recycle the cups, this is essential and a great idea on the part of Nespresso. you can also recycle pods at Nespresso stores
customer_reviews.author: Chris Myers

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged, only about half of the pods were actually usable. The rest of the pods were so damaged and distorted, they wouldn’t sit in the machine properly.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Pingree

customer_reviews.title: Great value for same product vs buying these at the store
customer_reviews.text: If you want to save some money, but get the original Nespresso brand quality and taste, this is "The ONE" to buy. Having tried gourmesso and bestpresso, this is the only one that is fresh due to the proper seal of the pods vs the copycats. Simply, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Fung

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the coffee made for single use, Nespresso does the best job! From the quality of the coffee itself, to the variety and to the design and airtightness, these capsules are the best available. I find the alternatives (in order to save money and/or use one's own coffee) not worth the trouble. Nespresso has developed a range of coffees that encourage experimentation, which for me has resulted in finding more types that I like as well as developing skill in preparation. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PrescottJer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the best home pod system refills!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Pods. Lungo was my favorite, rich Heavy flavor intense coffee. Great price for the best home pod system refills! I did notice these pods came from Sweden and were in another language, maybe thats why they are cheaper here? didn't bother me as it still tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Bosua

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit pricier than ordering directly from Nespresso, but we had an Amazon gift card so I decided to roll the dice with these! They're definitely the real deal (actual Nespresso pods) and I absolutely love all the flavors in this variety pack. Most offer a decaf sleeve which I never drink, so it is nice to have an entire set of not only full caf, but the robust varietals! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allie S.

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal--don't waste your money on imposters
customer_reviews.text: Get there the real deal and forget the cheap imposters. The off brand of nespresso pods are not good. These ones are in metal and work correctly. I still struggle to memorize the colors and strengths. I wish they had a sturdy, easy-to-read card that had color code posted. I bought imposters and even though they seemed cheaper in the end I threw so many away that jammed or didn't work right that they were no deal at all. Also the imposters are plastic! ick.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I really like good coffee but I'm lazy when it comes to preparing food. Sure I can get better coffee at a good coffee house, but this works great when I'm staying home.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flood

customer_reviews.title: it almost looks like they were all squeezed before being put in the ...
customer_reviews.text: All of my pods came squished and bent from all sides. So saddened by this because I was really excited to receive them... it almost looks like they were all squeezed before being put in the package. Won't order again, I'll go to the mall next time. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: aberoonie

customer_reviews.title: Not intense
customer_reviews.text: Hmm.... so they are calling this an intense family, where there is no Kazzar(strongest flavor 12) and no Durkhan (one following it 11) All these are 8 to 10 strength. They also have included a lungo, which is also dissapointing when you are purchasing and intenso line. So i had to buy those flavors separately. Will not order again. Needs to be renamed or the content needs to be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee for Nespresso machines
customer_reviews.text: I have an original type Nespresso machine. This collection is some of the best coffees I have found for that purpose. A little more expensive than a lot of non-brand items, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: hew

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee ever. I learned my lesson by trying cheaper non-Nespresso capsuls. Nespresso are the only ones we buy now. The only negative is the price. Very expensive at about a dollar each. Considering I use 2 per cup, that adds up fast. I am looking for a cheaper option.
customer_reviews.author: N. Marko

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty! My boyfriend loves these flavors so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty! My boyfriend loves these flavors so I try to keep them stocked for him (plus I'm now a fan!) Darker roast sophisticated flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great Product but too expensive. I switched to an alternative brand that works great, is cheaper and has flavors. No you don't get as good of a rich poor or "crema" on top, but I can sacrifice some crema for like $10 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: kindledafire

customer_reviews.title: The best and so easy
customer_reviews.text: Never thought my cheap ways would find me here writing a review on the best thing since well...Starbucks🤣 and best of all my latte costs me about a buck! Yes it’s about .70 a pod and if I want a 16oz knock your socks off I may even use 2 pods in it but man i am totally in love and if I see on sale I will stock up 😍
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety pack. Some bold, some mild, so I can pick what I'm in the mood for. I'm forever a fan of the Nespresso machine and espressos.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: There is not a knock-off out there that beats the original Nespresso capsules. They are expensive, but justifiable when compared to a drink at Starbucks. Many complain about the dented capsules, but I was able to use every single one without problems.
customer_reviews.author: jason dunham

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite mixed set of nespresso pods
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mixed set of nespresso pods. They really cannot be beat. I have tried aftermarket ones and it is just not the same. The quality of the beans is unbeatable. I love how flavorful the espresso is. Also creates a great aroma.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the extra few dollars! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I bought a pack of 50 capsules. It tastes amazing! The flavors are full bodied and robust. It drips well through the machine. I have purchased compatible capsules but the flavor does not compare. Non nespresso capsules I have found do not cream as much as the original pods. I look forward to every cup each day. It’s worth the extra dollars. You always know what to expect with each delicious cup.
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes as delicious as a fancy espresso but slightly pricey
customer_reviews.text: Of all the "pod" coffee systems I've tried, this one is my favorite and these are the tastiest. I just wish they were less expensive, but overall it's still cheaper than going to Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Stadtmiller

customer_reviews.title: These tasted great and worked wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: These tasted great and worked wonderfully. The reason they didn't get 5 stars is the sleeves were slightly squished when I received them, and some of the capsules were too. They still produced a good cup of coffee, but maybe they need some sturdier packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Beekeepers are great

customer_reviews.title: All dented.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be "seconds" from nespresso as each capsule is dented. They work fine.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING COMES CLOSE
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING COMES CLOSE. no imitations, please! I couldn't be happier with the flavors, variety, horsepower, value.
customer_reviews.author: Zev

customer_reviews.title: So far Legato makes the best third-party I've found
customer_reviews.text: The only real option for nespresso pods. I've tried several third party pods and none of them come close in taste. These are roughly 20 cents/pod more than competitors, but so worth it, in my opinion. So far Legato makes the best third-party I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes better than the knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: Tastes better than the knockoffs. If you are going to go to the expense of Nespresso, why would you buy inferior coffee. If that is what you want, buy a Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: J. Collen

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety to keep things interesting!
customer_reviews.text: Love these variety packs. I get to experience different types of coffee and my partner and I can each have our favorites. All are quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, accurately described, fairly priced, well packed and promptly shipped. What more can you ask!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I tried Bestpresso which had a Groupon and in general cost so much less but it just is puny and not at all the same. So I broke down and bought the real Nespresso capsules again and they are Way better tasting! I guess compared to a coffee bar the cost is less by far and really worth it if you love espresso! Of course loved the quick Prime shipping time too.
customer_reviews.author: CATHI OAKES

customer_reviews.title: Very bad!
customer_reviews.text: I got mine smash, very bed, why they have soft paper for protection, I recived them all twisted! Very bad!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: i love the ease and the comfort of my morning cup ...
customer_reviews.text: im so afraid they will stop making these pods and the coffee maker was a fortune! i love the ease and the comfort of my morning cup of coffee
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso delight
customer_reviews.text: Always my favorite coffee, the variety is interesting if you want to try different flavors and decide which it is your favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical if these would be as good as they commercials with Danny Devito and George Clooney make them out to be, but I was really impressed how good they are! I prefer them over anything I have found at Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman TimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Makes my husband happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband. They arrived on time and where exactly as described. My husband has loved trying the different flavors and so far has loved every one of them. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Really good coffee everytime
customer_reviews.text: Really good coffee everytime. I just wish i can find something as good but cheaper! For a coffee addict it gets expensive
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the intense variety pack over the regular variety pack
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend the intense variety pack over the regular variety pack, since even the most intense Nespresso blends are weak compared to 'real' espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beats that other "K" brand
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this stuff. Only thing is, even a drug habit would be less expensive. She uses a very simple model brewer from those Nespresso people as well (fill with water, push button) & "woosh" (literally) Nespresso! I think they sit around a table all day & think up nifty ways to take your allowance. Keurig, eat your heart out.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Despite the package looking immaculate, most of the capsules ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite the package looking immaculate, most of the capsules were smashed and couldn't be used in the coffee machine. I ended up throwing away half of them...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good selection for those who like darker roasts
customer_reviews.text: Good selection for those who like darker roasts. Nespresso quality. Only gripe is price -- Actually cheaper if you buy from Nespresso, but you have to buy a larger quantity to get free shipping from them. If you intend to buy a lot at once, buying direct from Nespresso is the way go.
customer_reviews.author: photomate

customer_reviews.title: the best coffee! I have 2 nespresso machines
customer_reviews.text: the best coffee!I have 2 nespresso machines .one for just plain coffee.the other makes cappucino espresso machiato
customer_reviews.author: gorgeous grandma

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso for Nespresso Makes Sense
customer_reviews.text: I have tried alternatives for Nespresso machines but come back to original Nespresso. The full flavored coffee is the best thing in the morning. Prefer levels 10 and above, however keep the lower intensity for those who do not like strong coffee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I did like most of them
customer_reviews.text: Got these when I ordered my machine. Some of them were a bit much for me, but I did like most of them. Wish there were more options of how to buy at lower price - these capsules definitely work better and deliver more flavor than any of the competitors' 'nespresso-compatible' offerings. Plus they produce truly genuine-looking/tasting espresso!!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Dented and Damaged Pods
customer_reviews.text: Way too many dented pods, already found one I can't even use. Seems worth only buying straight from Nespresso in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Metal pods are great quality and taste
customer_reviews.text: Having tried a number of plastic pods, these metal pods are definitely the way I prefer this system. I will most often be buying these for taste and quality reasons through the future.
customer_reviews.author: A Rohner

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso is great!
customer_reviews.text: I look forward every morning to using my Nespresso coffee maker with these Intense OriginalLine capsules.This is the second time I have ordered them from this provider and they come quickly and intact. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Prices on THE NESPRESSO website are cheaper. These flavors are the strongest of the capsules they have for sale
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I like the Nespresso coffees
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I like switching between the different flavors and I can't get my day started without a coffee from my Nespresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: sad sack

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, good prize compared to other sites including the Nespresso site
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the prize. It includes 10 capsules of each flavor and you save a few dollars compare even to the ones sold on the Nespresso web site.
customer_reviews.author: ukym

customer_reviews.title: Great experiment.
customer_reviews.text: Love trying the different flavors of coffee. Now have some favorites and some I wouldn't order on my own. All in all, an excellent sampling for a really cool cup of lungo, espresso or cappuccino.
customer_reviews.author: Sneekypete

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nespresso coffee so much! I’ve tried other off brands and none taste as good or strong as the Nespresso ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Christmas gift. The person who took ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. The person who took receipt said that 1-2 of the coffee varieties was a little "off" ....
customer_reviews.author: Mark Flesher

customer_reviews.title: Now he can stop borrowing from colleagues...
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety. My husband has been poaching from his colleagues and likes this coffee so much that he's bought his own- and he's very picky about coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Julien A Bitang

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect cup of coffee every time
customer_reviews.text: Just love my nespresso machine and the varieties of coffee. They are all great!
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: Boxes were torn up and/or smashed. The pods were disfigured.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodan Orias

customer_reviews.title: tried cheating
customer_reviews.text: Tried cheating on nespresso, but the infidelity didn't last for more than one pod. I came back running to the comfort of nespresso pods.
customer_reviews.author: Vikas Garg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality coffee as usual
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality coffee as usual. I love my Nespresso machine for times when I just want a cup and not a whole pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: ingternet

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great selection!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best price I’ve found. And I love that there are options to purchase sets of various roasting intensities. Personally, I’m a fan of the darker roasts so this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ashellris

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee in the world
customer_reviews.text: Incredible flavors. Best coffee on the planet. Knocks the socks off of Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The coffee was good but I'm not sure if they are as fresh as directly from Nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: K. Steere

customer_reviews.title: Mostly okay
customer_reviews.text: All of these are good with the exception of one which was extremely weak.
customer_reviews.author: M T

customer_reviews.title: The package came in pieces!
customer_reviews.text: The way this product was packaged, it had fell apart and the capsules were not even in the sleeves. The boxes were smashed and we could not even count if we receved the correct number of capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Marty P.

customer_reviews.title: But I Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not so tasty. Decent amount for the price. But I Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: Works fine in machine
customer_reviews.text: 1 star off due to capsule dents. Works fine in machine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Roma package opened and missing 1 Capsule when arrived
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged, and the roma package was opened with one missing, there were only 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Mattern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the flavors. tried to get a cheaper version and it was undrinkable.
customer_reviews.author: sungalina lee

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso order
customer_reviews.text: always good...I keep reordering this item what else do you want me to say, this is very strange...always good should be enough for an item I order quiet frequently.. Manny
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order the correct pods for your machine!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect in our older nespresso machine! Express coffee wonderful! Feel like I am ordering in Italy!
customer_reviews.author: Ray oliver

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like Nespresso. I bought these for my Inissia. Tried other less expensive capsules, but they weren't that great. Came back to Nespresso and won't leave again.
customer_reviews.author: Prime member

customer_reviews.title: The boyfriend enjoyed the extra strong variety pack
customer_reviews.text: Had a nespresso machine but ran out of the pods. The boyfriend enjoyed the extra strong variety pack. These are still a bit pricy compared to the kurig backs.. but overall, a good value from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R.T.H

customer_reviews.title: Variety is there
customer_reviews.text: I love my dark nespresso collection. Good variety and flavors
customer_reviews.author: Ava McEachern

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lot os dents. Some were broken and spilled coffee all inside the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Rabelo

customer_reviews.title: NO INDRIYA
customer_reviews.text: I did not recieve any Indriya, which is the only reason I purchased this pack. India and Indriya are two different flavors. The pictures and description both say Indriya.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Dents.
customer_reviews.text: 19 of the capsules came dented. Some more seriously dented than others. Extreamly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M001

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back to order!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value on the best coffee! Variety pack keeps the mornings fresh. Bonus... I don't have to wait in line (or spend $$$) at the coffee house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: They all had a odd flavor to them, Not sure if maybe it was old coffee. I will stick with buying from Nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the flavors. I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never disapoints
customer_reviews.text: These capsules never disappoint. Great for when you don't have time to make drip coffee.
customer_reviews.author: AtillaSmokey

customer_reviews.title: I love my Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nespresso. This pack was set in a box instead of just a plastic envelope. Finally didn’t have to unbend any of the pods!
customer_reviews.author: nolamom

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great expresso .... but way tooooo expensive.... No quantity discount
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee. Terrible delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is good. However, most of my capsules were crushed when I got them...
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: delivery was not damaged, and this coffee is my go - to every single morning
customer_reviews.author: Uli Long

customer_reviews.title: The good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These intense capsules are the reason why Nespresso has been such a hit.
customer_reviews.author: ACAR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordering more. Wish you sold strong and stronger. In the package it includes two of the weakest coffees: forticcio lungo. Can you replace these two weakest ones w either Roma ristretto kazaar or indria? Then I would buy more. And drink more.
customer_reviews.author: John MOY

product_meta.title: 50 Nespresso OriginalLine Capsules variety pack: Intense Family - ''NOT compatible with Vertuoline''
product_meta.description: 50 NESPRESSO Capsules(10 RISTRETTO, 10 ARPEGGIO, 10 ROMA, 10 INDRIYA FROM INDIA, 10 FORTISSIO LUNGO ) NOT COMPETIBLE WITH VERTUOLINE MACHINES.
feature_bullets: NOT Compatible with VertuoLine machines. For use with Nespresso OriginalLine machines.
10 Ristretto, 10 Arpeggio, 10 Roma, 10 Indriya from India, 10 Fortissio Lungo
